def: An instrument for facilitating the practical use of spherics innavigation and astronomy, being constructed of two cardboardscontaining various circles, and turning upon each other in such amanner that any possible spherical triangle may be readily found, andthe measures of the parts read off by inspection.
The larval form of a trematode worm having the shape of atadpole, with its body terminated by a tail-like appendage.
One who makes an offering as an act worship or reverence. Dr.H. More.
To burn or discolor by the sun; to tan.Sunburnt and swarthy though she be. Dryden.
The character in which Sanskrit is written.
A thin, pointed nail, with a heavy flaring head, for securing ahorsehoe to the hoof; a horsehoe nail.
